content: there is no gauge included as the pattern is designed to suit any weight yarn and is tailored to fit any size in terms of skeins i didn t actually use a full skein and this would work beautifully as a little stash busting project as well i do hope you enjoy the pattern and the hats you make as much as i have please remember to tag me on instagram @tinyanaesthetist and also use the hashtag akilspompombeanie so i can see all your creations
